text: The Buffalo News is a daily newspaper located in the Buffaloâ€“Niagara Falls metropolitan area in downtown Buffalo, New York. It just sold its headquarters to Uniland Development Corp. For decades, this was the only paper fully owned by Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway. On January 29, 2020, the paper reported that it was being sold to Lee Enterprises. ==References== Category:Newspapers in the United States Category:Buffalo, New York Category:1880 establishments in the United States
title: The Buffalo News
